channel.title: Posts on UNC MBB TRIVIA
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on UNC MBB TRIVIA

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Welcome to UNC MBB TRIVIA! Did-you-know-dotdotdot type trivia will be presented for all UNC MBB fans to enjoy. Stay tuned!

item.title: Winning Series
item.description: Here it is, the very first trivia! Frankly I was initially curious which schools have kept winning against UNC and found out which, but to start off things on a positive note :) I’m posting which schools have never won against UNC since 1949-50 season while having played UNC at least 10 times. Two of the four teams featured above are on schedule for 2017-2018 season, so it’ll be interesting to see if UNC can keep the winning streak.
